f. addinfo_id as f_addinfo_id , f. adtx as f_fieldset70_adtx , f. txnr as f_fieldset70_txnr , f. regi as f_fieldset70_regi , f. inco as f_fieldset70_inco , f. comp as f_fieldset70_comp , f. paco as f_fieldset70_paco , f. taxe as f_fieldset70_taxe , f. disc as f_fieldset70_disc , f. bain as f_fieldset70_bain , f. ceti as f_fieldset70_ceti , f. meor as f_fieldset95_meor , f. mere as f_fieldset95_mere , f. isag as f_fieldset95_isag , f. paya as f_fieldset95_paya , f. codo as f_fieldset95_codo , f. regr as f_fieldset95_regr , f. f95_drop as f_fieldset95_drop , f. psag as f_fieldset95_psag , f. resa as f_fieldset95_resa , f. sola as f_fieldset95_sola , f. infa as f_fieldset95_infa
from v_gen_info a left join v_gen_info_a1 a1 on a1.info_id = a.info_id left join v_underlying_sec b on a.info_id = b.info_id left join v_underlying_sec_b1 b1 on b1.usecu_id = b.usecu_id left join v_underlying_sec_b2 b2 on b2.usecu_id = b1.b1_usecu_id left join v_interm_sec c on c.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_detail d on d.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_option e on e.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_option_e1 e1 on e1.caoptn_id = e.caoptn_id left join v_action_option_e1a e1a on e1a.e1_caoptn_id = e1.e1_caoptn_id left join v_action_option_e2 e2 on e2.caoptn_id = e.caoptn_id left join v_add_info f on f.info_id = a.info_id limit #{startNo},#{pageSize}

select * from v_gen_info a left join v_gen_info_a1 a1 on a1.info_id = a.info_id left join v_underlying_sec b on a.info_id = b.info_id left join v_underlying_sec_b1 b1 on b1.usecu_id = b.usecu_id left join v_underlying_sec_b2 b2 on b2.usecu_id = b1.b1_usecu_id left join v_interm_sec c on c.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_detail d on d.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_option e on e.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_option_e1 e1 on e1.caoptn_id = e.caoptn_id left join v_action_option_e1a e1a on e1a.e1_caoptn_id = e1.e1_caoptn_id left join v_action_option_e2 e2 on e2.caoptn_id = e.caoptn_id left join v_add_info f on f.info_id = a.info_id where a.info_id = #{usecu_id}

select count(*) from v_gen_info a left join v_gen_info_a1 a1 on a1.info_id = a.info_id left join v_underlying_sec b on a.info_id = b.info_id left join v_underlying_sec_b1 b1 on b1.usecu_id = b.usecu_id left join v_underlying_sec_b2 b2 on b2.usecu_id = b1.b1_usecu_id left join v_interm_sec c on c.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_detail d on d.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_option e on e.info_id = a.info_id left join v_action_option_e1 e1 on e1.caoptn_id = e.caoptn_id left join v_action_option_e1a e1a on e1a.e1_caoptn_id = e1.e1_caoptn_id left join v_action_option_e2 e2 on e2.caoptn_id = e.caoptn_id left join v_add_info f on f.info_id = a.info_id where 1=1
and a.corp = #{corp}
